document_data.name: Aleka Ravenheart
document_data.mainbody: '''Aleka Ravenheart''' was an officer of the [[Purple Dragons]] in charge of the garrison of [[Thistleflame Keep]] in [[Suzail]], who served in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Aleka had an athletic build and wore her black hair in a long braid.
document_data.Personality: She was dependable, dutiful, and took her position very seriously, though she could be lured into making foolhardy decisions.
document_data.Possessions: She wore [[chainmail]] armor and carried a [[longsword]], in addition to a ''[[ring of regeneration]]''.
document_data.Relationships: Aleka was good friends with [[Haverish Hallefon]], innkeep of the [[Bubbling Bulwark]] and a former soldier in her regiment.
document_data.History:
In [[1369 DR]], she was in charge of the 40-strong Purple Dragons garrison of [[Thistleflame Keep]] in [[Suzail]].

Her investigation ultimately uncovered the involvement of the [[Emerald Swords]] [[Adventurer|adventuring]] company, who had actually kidnapped Lord Thistle and murdered the [[doppelganger]] [[Xixis]] in his place. As it was "merely' kidnapping and not the murder of a noble, she had the authority to have the Swords exiled from [[Cormyr]], rather than executed.
